Description: Explore the beaches of Goa-palaces of Mysore-backwaters of Kerala-and the rich history of Chennai
Itinerary: Goa(4 Nights) - Mysore(4 Nights) - Kovalam(4 Nights) - Chennai(4 Nights)

Description: Experience the iconic Taj Mahal in Agra-vibrant culture of Jaipur-and majestic palaces of Udaipur
Itinerary: Delhi (2 Nights) - Agra (3 Nights) - Jaipur (3 Nights) - Udaipur (2 Nights)

Description: Immerse yourself in the colonial charm of Kolkata-vibrant culture of Guwahati-beauty of Darjeeling-and spiritual significance of Varanasi
Itinerary: Kolkata(3 Nights) - Guwahati(3 Nights) - Darjeeling(3 Nights) - Varanasi(3 Nights)

Description: Discover the cosmopolitan city of Mumbai-the historical significance of Pune-the architectural marvels of Ahmedabad-and beach paradise of Goa
Itinerary: Mumbai (3 Nights) - Pune (2 Nights) - Ahmedabad (3 Nights) - Goa (4 Nights)

Description: Witness the architectural beauty of Amritsar's Golden Temple-trek in the Himalayas near Shimla-and experience white water rafting
Itinerary: Amritsar (3 Nights) - Shimla (2 Nights) - Delhi (2 Nights)

Description: Rejuvenate your mind body and soul with a relaxing stay in Kerala including Ayurvedic treatments and yoga sessions
Embark on a culinary adventure through Kerala-Tamil Nadu-Karnataka
Itinerary: Kovalam (4 Nights) - Chennai (5 Nights) - Bangalore (5 Nights)
